hadiths.text: This hadith has been transmitted by Qatada with the same chain of transmitters. But Shu'ba (one of the narrators) said:At the end of Surah al-Kahf, but Hammam said: At the beginning of Surah al-Kahf

chapter.ara-name: باب فَضْلِ سُورَةِ الْكَهْفِ وَآيَةِ الْكُرْسِيِّ
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of Surat al-Kahf and Ayat al-Kursi
